mapper.select: SELECT b.id, a.id AS communityId FROM sb_community a LEFT JOIN sb_member_address b ON a.name_ = b.community_name AND a.area_id = b.street_id WHERE b.community_id = - 1 AND b.del_flag = 1
SELECT a.id, b.id as streetId FROM sb_member_address a LEFT JOIN sb_area b ON a.town_code = b.code_ WHERE a.street_id = - 1 AND b.id IS NOT NULL
